Name: fromRoleNames
Description: Child Role list will be loaded based on this list. All roles will be loaded if you don't define.

Name: componentId
Description: Id of role autocomplete.

Name: selectedRole
Description: Required input and output value for selected role.

Name: excludedRolenames
Description: Roles will be excluded from role selection. This is applied if you use default completeMethod.

Name: requiredMessage
Description: Message to be displayed when role autocomplete validation fails.

Name: forceSelection
Description: Only accepts role from the list when it's enabled.

Name: minQueryLength
Description: Number of characters to be typed before starting to query.

Name: completeMethod
Description: method for role autocomplete.

Name: isDisabled
Description: Disable Role Selection.

Name: isRequired
Description: Marks Role Selection as required.

Name: isReadOnly
Description: Cannot change role when it's enabled.

Name: isRenderedMessage
Description: Specify the rendering of message for role field.

Name: hightlight
Description: Highlights the first suggested role automatically.

Name: floatingLabel
Description: Display label with floating style and labelPanelStyleClass can't be applied if itâ€™s enabled.

Name: autocompleteStyleClass
Description: Style class of role autocomplete.

Name: autoCompletePanelStyleClass
Description: Style class of role autocomplete panel.

Name: inputStyleClass
Description: Style class of role autocomplete input.

Name: labelPanelStyleClass
Description: Style class of label panel.

Name: labelStyleClass
Description: Style class of label.

Name: label
Description: Text of label for role selection component.

Name: size
Description: Number of characters used to determine the width of the input element.

Name: messageStyleClass
Description: Style class of message.

Name: itemLabel
Description: Displayed text of selected role item and roles in dropdown list.

Name: cache
Description: Autocomplete caches the searched result list if it's enabled.

Name: moreText
Description: The text shown in panel when the suggested list is greater than maxResults.

Name: queryDelay
Description: Delay to wait in milliseconds before sending each query to the server.

Name: maxResults
Description: Maximum number of results to be displayed.

Name: scrollHeight
Description: scrollHeight attribute of primefaces autocomplete.
